note.p: Daughter of Peter Holland, artist, and his wife, Elizabeth. Born in Liverpool. Lived in Knutsford, Cheshire with her older sister Hannah Susannah (Susan) Holland.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2163/361/9)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 June 2017)
Lancashire, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 June 2017)
